name.ja: <ruby>白<rt>しろ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>森<rt>もり</rt></ruby>のリゼット

text.en: You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, then add 1 "White Woods" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Risette of the White Woods". If a LIGHT Spellcaster Tuner(s) is Special Summoned to your field during your opponent's turn while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Risette of the White Woods" once per turn.
